001package squidpony.squidgrid.gui.animation;
002
003import java.awt.Point;
004import java.awt.event.ActionListener;
005import java.awt.image.BufferedImage;
006import javax.swing.JComponent;
007
008/**
009 * Controls animations of images. Intended to be used with a Timer to activate
010 * the animation frames.
011 *
012 * The component for the animation must be set before the animation will
013 * function properly. All coordinates will be relative to the coordinate plane
014 * of the provided component.
015 *
016 * @author Eben Howard - http://squidpony.com - howard@squidpony.com
017 */
018public interface Animation extends ActionListener {
019
020    /**
021     * Returns true if the component should continue to be allowed to animate.
022     * Animations on a loop will always return true so some outside mechanism
023     * must decide when to terminate them.
024     *
025     * @return true if the animation is still in action
026     */
027    public boolean isActive();
028
029
030    /**
031     * Returns the static image associated with this animation. Will typically
032     * be the ending image, but this may vary based on the animation style.
033     *
034     * This method is intended to be called when converting an animation into a
035     * static image.
036     *
037     * @return the image of the animation's final state
038     */
039    public BufferedImage getImage();
040
041    /**
042     * Sets the Component in which this animation will take place. This must be
043     * set for the animation to function.
044     *
045     * @param component the GUI element to display in
046     */
047    public void setComponent(JComponent component);
048
049    /**
050     * Removes this animation from the component it's in.
051     */
052    public void remove();
053
054    /**
055     * Returns the coordinate of the top left corner of the animation.
056     *
057     * @return the location coordinate
058     */
059    public Point getLocation();
060}
